item.description:
North Shore Technology Council's Friday: "High Shear Processing of Nanoparticles for Drug Delivery"

When: Friday, June 1, 2012 | 12:30pm- 2:00 pm
Where: 300 Trade Center, Woburn, MA, 6th Floor, Offices of McLane Law Firm

North Shore Technology Council's Friday June 1st program

Learn more and register on the NSTC Website.

 

http://nstc.org/

 

Drug delivery in the form of nanoparticles provides a way to ensure that hydrophobic drugs offer high bioavailability. Microfluidics' PureNanoTM high shear processing technology produces drug particles from the "bottom up" in the form of nanocrystals, or polymer encapsulated drugs, which are necessary to deliver effectively hydrophobic drugs with high bioavailability.
item.name: "High Shear Processing of Nanoparticles for Drug Delivery"
